backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles, mod settings, spawners, and process selection with authorization checks and update/query methods.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles and settings into the new schema with updated spawner and mod settings fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of all major frontend files including components, hooks, panels, and assets.
frontend/ANDROID_APK_BUILD.md: Guide explaining how to package the web app as an Android APK using Bubblewrap TWA, including prerequisites and build steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining color tokens, themes, and desert-themed palettes plus rainbow animation support.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting title, manifest reference, and mounting root element for the web app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theming, icons, and shortcuts for installation and TWA compatibility.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry component wrapping ModMenuPage with AuthGate and displaying global notifications.
frontend/src/components/ApkBuildInstruct: Empty placeholder component file for APK build instruction UI.
frontend/src/components/AppToAppLauncher: Empty placeholder component file for app-to-app launcher panel UI.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Handles authentication flow, showing login, loading, profile setup, or app content based on user identity and profile state.
frontend/src/components/DownloadsPanel.t: Empty placeholder component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/ItemSpawnerPanel: Provides UI to add, remove, clear, and spawn custom items while logging spawn actions.
frontend/src/components/ModStatusBar.tsx: Displays active mod settings as badges and shows the total number of enabled mods.
Shows a searchable prefab catalog with filtering and clipboard copy support, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/PrefabSpawnerPan: Allows searching prefab catalog, adding prefabs to the spawn list, spawning them, and clearing all prefabs.
frontend/src/components/ProcessSelectorP: Displays available processes, allows selecting a target process, and supports refreshing the process list.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: UI dialog for creating a user profile, capturing a name and initializing default profile fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppToAppLink.ts: Stores and updates a deep link string in localStorage with reset and setter helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useBrowserHistory.ts: Implements a simple in-memory browser history with go, back, forward, and reload handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, managing login, logout, stored identities, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useItemSpawner.ts: Fetches item spawner data and exposes an add-item mutation with loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useModSettings.ts: Loads, merges, and updates mod settings across backend and localStorage, exposing a unified settings state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefabCatalog.ts: Fetches a static prefab catalog JSON file and returns it via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useProcessSelector.ts: Reads and updates the selected backend process with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for user profile, mod settings, item spawner, and process operations against the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRuntimeEnv.ts: Detects device and browser environment flags from the user agent string.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark modes, base styles, and a rainbow background animation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BrowserPage.tsx: Implements an inâ€‘app browser with URL input, navigation controls, and an iframe rendering the target page.
frontend/src/pages/ModMenuPage.tsx: Renders the mod menu UI including status, process selector, movement mods, and settings controls with themed layout.
frontend/src/state/modSettings.ts: Defines mod settings structure, defaults, clamping, and helpers for storing and retrieving settings from localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both URL and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, themes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state for a mod menu with cheat toggles, spawners, visual effects, and process selection, plus required cover art. Lists all existing features with IDs, requirement links, and versions.
